context.description: Enter the path to a file with ".jks" extension. Enter the password and check the correctness before proceeding.
Are you doing Client-side implementation or Server-side implementation? NOTE: If you are implementing on the Server-side, then you must know the Port number of the server.
If you know both IP address and Port number of the server, select Yes.
Enter the IP address and Port number of the server. Please ensure that you have entered them correctly.
This is an optional step for testing the connection to the host IP.
If you do not accept the default configuration, you have to choose the cipher suites and TLS protocol versions that you wish to use.
Choose the option that you wish and click 'Select' button. You can make multiple selections and the same time. The same applies for de-selection.
Enter the Port number of the server. Please ensure that you have entered them correctly.
